value.title: Enquiry
value.description: A question related to this contracting process, generally sent during the enquiry period.

id.title: Identifier
id.description: A unique identifier for the enquiry.

date.title: Date
date.description: The date the enquiry was received or processed.

author.title: Question author
author.description: The identifier and name of the party asking this question. Questioners may be listed in the parties array with a role of 'enquirer'. Procurement policies vary on whether or not the identity of those asking questions should be disclosed, or at which stage this information may be disclosed.

title.title: Question title
title.description: The subject line of the question.

answer.title: Answer
answer.description: The answer to this question, when available.

dateAnswered.title: Date answered
dateAnswered.description: The date the answer to the question was provided.

relatedItem.title: Related item
relatedItem.description: If this question relates to a specific line-item, this field contains the line-item identifier.

value.title: Enquirires
value.description: Questions sent to the procuring entity, and the answers given
